titleStmt.title: This is a true copy of the ordynaunce made in the tyme of the reygne of Kynge Henry the .VI. to be obserued in the kynges Eschequier by the officers and clerkes of the same for takynge of fees of the kynges accomptis in the same courte.
titleStmt.author: England.
England. Exchequer.

notesStmt.note: Royal arms on t.p., initial, tail-piece; printer's device (McK. 3) frontis. and A₈v).
Imprint from colophon. Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
First two lines of title read: [floret]: This is a / true copy of the ordynaunce.
Error in register: A₂ marked D₂.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
